description: The Colorado Department of Agriculture is dedicated to protecting the health and well-being of those animals in pet care facilities and has established the Pet Animal Care Facilities as a model program for other states across the country. No other state currently has a program as inclusive and comprehensive, making Colorado a leader for pet care in the United States. This dataset presents the summary of statistics for pet care facilities in Colorado during the 2013 license year.

name: 2013 PACFA Summary of Shelter Statistics
